tool_description: The API enables you to make fast DNS and WHOIS lookups.
name: Retrieve DNS Entries
title: Retrieve DNS Entries

api_list.name: /api/schema
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://retrieve-dns-entries.p.rapidapi.com/api/schema"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "retrieve-dns-entries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
